inclusion.criterion: treated on frontline protocols at St. Jude
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: during or after treatment with multi-agent chemotherapy (TOTAL XI, XII, XIIIA, XIIIB)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: isolated extramedullary relapse after treatment on TOTXII
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients with recurrent T-Cell non-Hodgkin's lymphoma who relapse in the bone marrow
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: First relapse after receiving primary therapy or during primary therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Life expectance of at least 8 weeks
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient A is a 30-year-old male with TB, admitted to the hospital after 10 days of cough and fever. He has not any positive history of TB vaccination.
